action.action-desc: Mr. Moore of Utah (for himself and Ms. Pettersen) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exempt certain employees engaged in outdoor recreational outfitting or guiding services from maximum hours requirements.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Outdoor Recreational Outfitting and Guiding Act.

section.header: Exemption with respect to certain employees engaged in outdoor recreational outfitting or guiding services
section.text: Section 13(b) of the Fair Labor Standards Act (29 U.S.C. 213(b)) is amended by inserting after paragraph (3) the following:
